nodes.text: The G'Tep'Noi system was a star system. In the weeks before the Battle of Jakku, a New Republic taskforce headed by Hera Syndulla and Alphabet Squadron aboard the Deliverance chased the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing to the system, commencing their sixth engagement in their ongoing, cross-sector chase. The system was dense with rocky debris to the point of disorientation to the pilots of the New Republic, and the fighter wing ultimately escaped once again in the chaos.
